thoughts: Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could have warned r_c before-hand
Can still hear the clan's wails as Starclan took the newborn into their clutches
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} heard r_c's mewls from Starclan in a dream
Contemplates why Starclan took r_c so young
Is questioning if r_c would grow up in StarClan or stay a newborn
Prays that r_c is healthy and receives the strength {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} need to grow in StarClan
Is finally accepting that r_c was transported to Starclan for a reason
Is pondering which role r_c would have been
Ponders how StarClan would deal with r_c
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw r_c's spirit in the camp, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} only saw mist
Is listening to the reason behind r_c's name with a gentle smile
Wonders if newborn kits grow up to be adults or stay young forever in StarClan
Is asking StarClan why they take newborns to Silverpelt
Prays that all the newborn kits in StarClan get enough food to stay strong
Is contemplating StarClan and why they would allow newborns to pass
Is reflecting on r_c's pelt, and wonders how it will look under Silverpelt with a bittersweet smile
Was startled to see r_c in a dream this night
Was spooked when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} encountered a ghostly newborn while collecting herbs, which disappeared when noticed
Is asking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor why StarClan allows newborns to join Silverpelt
Is vowing to make sure Starclan takes care of r_c well
Is wondering if r_c was a part of the stars last night
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} heard r_c's mewls in a dream last night, but it was just the wind
Is questioning who would provide for r_c in StarClan
Wonders if r_c will get to eat their first meal in Starclan
Questions if r_c's spirit exists in the tall grasses
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw r_c's spirit hanging around the nursery tunnel
Wonders if r_c gets to venture out of the tunnels in StarClan
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw r_c playing with the roots of the tree, but sadly shakes off the thought
Was surprised to find r_c's spot in the nursery warm, despite {PRONOUN/r_c/object} being with the stars now
Is pondering if r_c would stay in tunnels or go out an explore the territory in StarClan
Wonders if the newborns in StarClan will ever get to play and run across open fields
Prays to StarClan that the passed newborn kits get to feel the wind across their pelt
Is wondering if r_c would have been {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} friend
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} would have swapped secrets with r_c

Helps decode an omen from Starclan
Is enjoying learning all of the clan's history!
Is memorizing the legends of Starclan
Is practicing analyzing the world around them to find omens

Makes sure the leader knows of a new prophesy

Is a bit overwhelmed at everything there is to learn about Starclan and its ways
Is learning the best way to talk to their warrior ancestors
Is learning how to find omens in nature
Is learning how to politely speak of Starclan
Is taking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} training very seriously
Is learning the signs of a wandering spirit

Wonders if r_c would have wanted to be a Starteller too
Wonders if r_c would have been a better Starteller
Wishes the other apprentices could understand how {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} feel
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} understood the apprentice's inside jokes
Wishes r_c understood Starclan like {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} does
Is assuring r_c that everything will be okay okay
Is wondering if StarClan is visiting r_c's dreams
Is realizing how lonely it can be to be a Starteller apprentice

Plans to visit the elders soon

Is talking to r_c about Starclan in hopes to learn more
Is hoping to make r_c feel younger today

Wants to help r_c with a new prophesy

Hopes to learn from r_c's expertise and seniority
Asks r_c how to tell the difference between an omen, ghost, and prophesy

Is worried about a new prophesy from their mentor
Is terrified of misreading an omen and dooming the clan

Is upset after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} froze at an omen from Starclan

Is curious about previous Startellers lying to their leaders

Is unsure of r_c's belief in Starclan

Is worried r_c is lying to their leader with no reason
Is skeptical of StarClan's choice of r_c as a Starteller
Is startled to find r_c witnessed a bad omen and told nobody, not even {PRONOUN/m_c/poss}

Is meeting secretly with r_c to discuss what to tell the leader--and what to 'leave out'.
Is helping r_c secretly lie about an omen
Is delighted to find r_c feels the same way about weak cats
Is glad r_c is against sharing life saving herbs with enemy Clans
Is standing with r_c, both glaring at the leader, knowing that they know things they shouldn't
